review:
I know him from 2005 when I visited to him regarding my broken jaw by accident. That time he practiced in Thakurpukur  dental hospital. He guided me me and operated me the jaw surgery (plate implanted) with another 2 doctors at Anadalok hospital (saltlake). 
Very helpful and good human being he is.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Environment is good but issue is no one tells you the cost until u asked
I was there for my dental treatment and i was supposed to do RCT for number 7 and crowning for same tooth 
RCT price was 5500
Crowning price was 6500
Package is 12000
Which is way too much higher
I belong to Delhi and working in kolkata and done my RCT from there but while at crowning process doctor suggested me 8500 price crowning which has 5 years of warranty.
My concern was since the warranty is for kolkata state only why shouldn’t I have done it from my home town which will help me in future.
I told doctor and his helper this
Doctor agreed but while leaving they asked me to pay 2000 for Restoration charges which I don’t know why they charged
So total for my tooth I have paid 7500 still crowning is left
***** ********** ** **** ********** **** **** ****** ******* ** ***** ***** * ***** ***** *** ***** ******* *****My suggestions if you have tons of money you can approach there
But there are other better options also.
